author: Mike Masnick
description: Ctrl-Alt-Speech is a weekly podcast about the latest news in online speech, from Mike Masnick and Everything in Moderation‘s Ben Whitelaw. Subscribe now on Apple Podcasts, Overcast, Spotify, Pocket Casts, YouTube, or your podcast app of choice — or go straight to the RSS feed. This is the second of our special episodes for the […]
title: Ctrl-Alt-Speech: You Asked, We Answered

author: Mike Masnick
description: The UK government has reportedly backed down from its dangerous demand that Apple build encryption backdoors, following pressure from the Trump administration. But the secretive nature of this “mutually beneficial” agreement should make us deeply suspicious about what was actually traded away. The UK government has backed down on a controversial demand for Apple to […]
title: UK Backs Down On Apple Encryption Backdoor—But The Secret Deal Raises New Questions

author: Tim Cushing
description: The Trump administration has been described as many things, none of them good. What no one will ever accuse it of being is “competent.” Trump has surrounded himself with sycophants, most of them known only for waving the MAGA flag when not hosting shows on Fox or podcasts celebrating the debut of American fascism. Case […]
title: ICE Goes Full Hegseth: Adds Random Person To Group Chat Discussing Ongoing Manhunt

author: Daily Deal
description: The 2025 Canva Bundle has six courses to help you learn about graphic design. From logo design to business cards to branding to bulk content creation, these courses have you covered. It’s on sale for $25. Note: The Techdirt Deals Store is powered and curated by StackCommerce. A portion of all sales from Techdirt Deals […]
title: Daily Deal: The 2025 Canva Bundle

author: Mike Masnick
description: Senator Amy Klobuchar is one of the top Democrats in the Senate. She could be fighting to protect democracy against fascists. She could be working on a new, better vision for Americans. But instead, she’s focused on breaking the internet. And now we know why: someone made a stupid satirical video about her, and her […]
title: Amy Klobuchar Wants To Break The Internet Because Someone Made A Stupid Satirical Video About Her

author: Karl Bode
description: I don’t mean to harp on this, but a central promise of the Trump administration during the last election season was that a second Trump term would “take aim at big tech,” protect the little guy, rein in corporate power, and even “continue the legacy of antitrust enforcers like Lina Khan.” The press was filled […]
title: Trump Admin Kills Enforcement Action Against 165 Corporations For Various Bullshit And Fraud

author: Timothy Geigner
description: If you’re tired of Techdirt posts about RFK Jr.’s inability to competently lead HHS, I’m tired of him leading that organization, so too bad. The problem is that RFK Jr. represents something of a national health emergency, one that is multi-faceted. The most obvious bucket of fuckery in which he is operating is, of course, […]
title: AAP Veers On COVID Vaccines From CDC, RFK Jr. Goes Straight To Conspiracy Theories In Response
